item.title: Titanic Survivor Analysis
item.description: This project performs an exploratory analysis of the Titanic dataset, with the aim of identifying patterns and factors that influenced passenger survival.

item.title: Cleaning fee
item.description: This project, carried out as part of a technical challenge (company omitted) during a Trainee selection process, demonstrates my skills in critical analysis and problem solving. The challenge required the evaluation of the method for calculating the cleaning fee for properties, the reformulation of this design based on the data provided and the proposal of an optimized model to ensure cost adequacy and fairness of the fee.

item.title: Secret Number Game
item.description: This repository contains the code for a simple and fun game, the “Secret Number Game”. The goal of the game is to guess a secret number randomly generated by the computer. The player inputs their guesses, and the game provides hints as to whether the secret number is higher or lower than the guess.

item.title: Text Decoder
item.description: Programming logic: Develop efficient algorithms to manipulate strings and perform encoding and decoding operations.
